summary:

title: A short ode to Sonoran Desert National Monument

summary: Latest survey reveals just 8% of organizations qualify as highly mature in the cloud.  Our results describe what sets them apart and the big benefits that follow

summary:
If you're seeing this in your RSS reader, it means I didn't completely fuck up the launch of my redesigned site.  Hooray. 
Yes, I successfully left Squarespace to venture off into the world of front end development, and have rebuilt this with Eleventy...
title: Felt cute, might delete later

summary: Come with us now to another time – a different time.  A future that comes to us from the past.  A time inspired by the pulp science fiction of another era...
title: The Big Idea: Allen Steele

summary:
We must learn to:

Live in it
Live on it
Navigate it
Surf it
Swim in it
Sail on it
Dive in it
Understand it
Love it
Cherish it
Embrace it

But, above all, don’t drown in it
title: Life is an Ocean

summary:
This move has been coming for a long time. 
The Biden administration on Thursday said it’s banning the company from selling its products to new US-based customers starting on July 20, with the company only allowed to provide software updates to existing customers through September 29.  The ban—­the first such action under authorities given to the Commerce Department in 2019­—follows years of warnings from the US intelligence community about Kaspersky being a national security threat because Moscow could allegedly commandeer its all-seeing antivirus software to spy on its customers
title: The US Is Banning Kaspersky

summary: Look, the early internet sucked.  It was shitty design.  We aren’t looking to go back to shitty design for shitty design’s sake...
title: It’s not about nostalgia, it’s about human connection

summary: We are delighted to announce that Tailscale has been awarded the AWS Networking Competency.  This recognition underscores Tailscale's deep expertise and proven success in delivering seamless, secure networking solutions on AWS
title: Tailscale achieves AWS Networking Competency

title: Terraform 1.9 enhances input variable validations
